definitions.title: subst., a.
definitions.body: of individual, ´[[מֶלֶח־עֲרָדהַכּ]] Nu 21:1 (J) and hence Nu 33:40 (P or R); f. [[הַכְּנַעֲנִיתּ]] Ge 46:10 = Ex 6:15 (P) [[בַּת־שׁוּעַ הַכְּנַעֲנִית]] 1Ch 2:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: usu. coll. (c. art.) of pre-Isr. in-habitants of [[כְּנַעַן]] (q.v.) Ge 12:6, Ge 24:3, Ge 24:37, Ge 50:11 (all J), Nu 21:3 (J), Jos 13:3 (D), Ju Jdg 1:1, Jdg 1:3, Jdg 1:9, Jdg 1:10, Jdg 1:17, many of whom continued to live in the midst of Isr., v:Jdg 1:27, v:Jdg 1:28, v:Jdg 1:29, v:Jdg 1:29, v:Jdg 1:30, v:Jdg 1:32, v:Jdg 1:33, Jos 16:10, Jos 16:10, Jos 17:12, Jos 17:13, Jos 17:16, Jos 17:18 (all JE), 1Ki 9:16; pl. only Ob:Ob 20, and [[ישְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ הַכְּנַעֲנִים]] Ne 9:24; ´[[מִשְׁפְּחוֹת הַכּ]] Ge 10:18, ´[[גְּבוּל הַכּ]] v:Ge 10:19 (both J), ´[[אֶרֶץ הַכּ]] Ex 13:11 (JE), Ez Eze 16:3; oft. of part of the inhabit., [[וְכָל ישְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[הַכּ]] Jos 7:9 (JE), De 11:30; with other n.pr.gent., + [[הַפְּרִוִּי]] Ge 13:7, Ge 34:30 (both J), Ju Jdg 1:4, Jdg 1:5, + [[הָאֱמׂרִי]] De 1:7, Jos 5:1, Jos 13:4 (all D); + [[הַחִוִּי]] 2Sa 24:7; + ([[י]])[[עֲמָלֵקִ ]] Nu 14:25, Nu 14:43, Nu 14:45; esp. in the list of peoples dispossessed by Isr., Ge 15:21, Ex 3:8, Ex 3:17, Ex 13:5, Ex 23:23, Ex 23:28, Ex 33:2, Ex 34:11, Nu 13:29 (´[[הַכּ]] dwelling by the sea and along Jordan [cf. De 1:7, De 11:30, Jos 5:1, Jos 11:3, Jos 13:4]; all these JE), De 7:1, De 20:17, Jos 3:10, Jos 9:1, Jos 11:3, Jos 12:8, Jos 24:11 (all JED), Ju Jdg 3:3, Jdg 3:5; hence Ezr 9:1, Ne 9:8. Cf. Dr:Dt. p. 11, 13 f., 97, 133.
